src_original: d. iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā dvitīyā tṛtīyā karmavācanā /
tgt_original: 此是初羯磨。 』第二、第三亦如是說。

src_original: e. muktā saṃghena mahatī sīmā /  muktā khuḍḍalikā sīmā /  pratiprasrabdho maṇḍalakaḥ /
tgt_original: 『僧伽已解小界場竟。

src_original: kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /  (Poṣ-v 336)
tgt_original: 僧伽已聽許，由其默然故，我今如是持。

src_original: Poṣ-v 54. tatra yadīcchanti vistārayitavyāḥ /  nocet saṃkocayitavyāḥ /  Poṣ-v 55.1. tataḥ paścād āvāsikanaivāsikair bhikṣubhiḥ khuḍḍalikāyāḥ sīmāyāś caturdiśaṃ sthāvarāṇi nimittāni saṃlakṣayitavyāni /  pūrvasyāṃ diśi kuḍyanimittaṃ vā vṛkṣanimittaṃ vā śailanimittaṃ vā prākāranimittaṃ vā prāgbhāranimittaṃ vā mārṣṭīkā vā kaḍḍhitavyā śilā vā ucchrepayitavyā kīlako vā nikhantavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 』若欲小界大界一時雙結及一時雙解者，其舊住諸苾芻眾，先安小界四方標相，先定東方牆相，或樹柵籬、土封、竪石、釘橛，南西北方亦復如是。

src_original: Poṣ-v 55.2. tataḥ paścāc chayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭavācikayā  bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite āvāsikanaivāsikair bhikṣubhiḥ  khuḍḍalikāyāḥ sīmāyāś caturdiśaṃ sthāvaranimittāni parikīrtayitavyāni /  (Poṣ-v 338)
tgt_original: 於兩界上，集二僧伽，各敷座席、鳴犍稚，言白復周眾既集已，令一苾芻應稱小界四方標相，先從東方某相，乃至北方某相。

src_original: pūrvavad yāvat kīlako vā nikhātaḥ /  Poṣ-v 56. mahatyāḥ sīmāyāś caturdiśaṃ sthāvarāṇi nimittāni parikīrtayitavyāni /  pūrvavad yāvat prāgbhāranimittaṃ vā /
tgt_original: 既稱相已，次稱大界四方標相，先從東方某相，乃至北方某相。

src_original: Poṣ-v 57.1. tataḥ paścād ubhayataḥsīmāyāṃ saṃghaṃ sthāpayitvā karmakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā  ubhe sīme kāṣṭhena vā daṇḍena vā kiṭakena vā kiliṃjena vā avaṣṭabhya jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 既稱大界相已，其秉法苾芻於二界上，或以床或枮席等壓兩界上，應先作白，方為羯磨。

src_original: Poṣ-v 65.1. atha bhagavāṃs tad eva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /  niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
tgt_original: 」爾時世尊，於十五日褒灑陀時，於苾芻眾中就座而坐，告諸苾芻曰：

src_original: nirgacchati bhikṣavo rātriḥ /  kuruta bhikṣavaḥ poṣadhaṃ /
tgt_original: 「夜分已過，可為長淨。

src_original: Poṣ-v 65.2. athānyatamo bhikṣur utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*
tgt_original: 」于時有一苾芻從座而起，偏露右肩虔誠合掌，作如是語：

src_original: anyatamasmiṃ bhadantāvāse bhikṣur ābādhiko duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ /  tasyāsmābhiḥ kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 「大德！ 於某房內有一苾芻，身有病苦，此欲如何？

src_original: bhagavān āha /
tgt_original: 」佛言：

src_original: pāriśuddhir asyānayitavyā /
tgt_original: 「可應取彼欲淨。

src_original: bhikṣavo na jānate katham ānayitavyeti /
tgt_original: 」時諸苾芻不知誰當合取？

src_original: bhagavān āha /
tgt_original: 佛言：

src_original: ekasya ekena dvābhyām ekena saṃbahulānāṃ yāvatāṃ vā śaknoti saṃghamadhye nāmānaṃ parikīrtayituṃ /
tgt_original: 「一人取一、一人取二、一人取多，乃至但能於大眾中稱說其名，隨意多取。

src_original: Poṣ-v 66.1. pāriśuddhidāyakasyāhaṃ bhikṣava bhikṣor āsamudācārikān dharmān prajñapayiṣyāmi /
tgt_original: 」佛言： 「與欲淨人所有行法，我今當說。

src_original: Poṣ-v 66.2. pāriśuddhidāyakena bhikṣuṇaikāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā upānahāv avamucya yathāvṛddhikayā sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā utkuṇḍakena (Poṣ-v 360)  sthitvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya idaṃ syād vacanīyaṃ /
tgt_original: 諸與欲淨苾芻先偏露右肩脫革屣，致敬已蹲踞合掌，作如是說：

src_original: samanvāharāyuṣmann adya saṃghasya poṣadhaḥ pāṃcadaśikaḥ mamāpy evaṃnāmo bhikṣoḥ poṣadhaḥ pāñcadaśikaḥ so 'ham evaṃnāmā bhikṣuḥ pariśuddham antarāyikair dharmair ātmānaṃ vadāmi /
tgt_original: 『具壽存念！ 今僧伽十四日為褒灑陀，我苾芻某甲亦十四日為褒灑陀。

src_original: poṣadhe me pāriśuddhim ārocayāmy ārocitāṃ ca pravedayāmi /
tgt_original: 我某甲自陳遍淨無諸障法，為病患因緣故，彼如法僧事，我今與欲清淨。

src_original: evaṃ dvir apy evaṃ trir api /
tgt_original: 此所陳事，當為我說。 』第二、第三亦如是說。

src_original: Poṣ-v 66.3. pāriśuddhidāyako bhikṣuḥ sacet kāyavijñaptyā pāriśuddhin dadāti /  dattā pāriśuddhir vaktavyā /
tgt_original: 」「大德！ 又復與欲淨苾芻有病不能起坐，以身表業而與欲淨，此得成不？

src_original: kāyavijñaptyā ca vāgvijñaptyā ca dadāti /  dattā pāriśuddhir vaktavyā /
tgt_original: 以口表業與欲淨者善與欲淨。

src_original: Poṣ-v 66.4. na kāyavijñaptyā na vāgvijñaptyā dadāti /  sarvasaṃghena vā tatra gantavyaṃ /  sa vā bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye 'vatārayitavyaḥ /  Poṣ-v 66.5. na sarvasaṃghas tatra gacchati /
tgt_original: 如其病人身表語表並不能者，諸有苾芻咸應總就病人處，或舁病人將入眾中。

src_original: taṃ ca bhikṣuṃ saṃghe nāvatārayiṣyanti /  vyagrāḥ kurvanti sātisārā bhavanti /  (Poṣ-v 362)
tgt_original: 若不爾者，作法不成，得別住罪。

src_original: Poṣ-v 67.1. pāriśuddhigrāhakasyāhaṃ bhikṣava bhikṣor āsamudācārikān dharmān prajñapayiṣyāmi /
tgt_original: 「諸取欲淨苾芻所有行法，我今當說。

src_original: Poṣ-v 67.2. pāriśuddhigrāhakeṇa bhikṣuṇā pāriśuddhiṃ gṛhītvā na dhāvitavyaṃ /  na dravitavyaṃ /  na laṃghatavyaṃ na + .. laṃghayitavyā /  na pariṣaṇḍā laṃghayitavyā /  noparivihāyasā sthātavyaṃ /  na bahiḥ sīmāṃ gantavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 時此苾芻受欲淨已，不急走、不跳躑、不越坑、不在欄楯危嶮之處，於寺中閣道之上不應一步而蹈兩階、不躡兩梯桄、不向界外、不乘空、不睡眠、不入定。

src_original: Poṣ-v 67.4. yadā saṃghasthaviraḥ kathayaty anāgamanāyāyuṣmantaś chandaṃ ca pāriśuddiṃ cārocayata /  ārocitāṃ ca pravedayatheti /  tenāntarikassa {for tenāntarikasya} bhikṣoḥ purataḥ sthitvā vaktavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 如說波羅底木叉時，作如是語： 『不來諸苾芻說欲及清淨。 』其持欲淨者，應對比坐或就別人作如是說：

src_original: samanvāhara āyuṣmann amuṣminn āvāse bhikṣur ābādhiko duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ /  adya saṃghasya poṣadhaḥ pāñcadaśikas tasyāpi bhikṣoḥ poṣadhaḥ pāñcadaśikaḥ so 'yam evaṃnāmā bhikṣuḥ pariśuddham antarāyikair dharmair ātmānaṃ vedayati /
tgt_original: 『大德存念！ 於某房中苾芻某甲身嬰病苦，今僧伽十四日為褒灑陀，彼苾芻某甲亦十四日為褒灑陀，彼苾芻某甲自陳遍淨無諸障法，為病患因緣故，如法僧事與欲清淨。

src_original: poṣadhe 'sya pāriśuddhim ārocayāmy ārocitāṃ ca pravedayāmi /
tgt_original: 彼所陳事，我今具說。

src_original: (Poṣ-v 366)  Poṣ-v 67.5. pāriśuddhigrāhako bhikṣur āsamudācārikān dharmān na samādāya vartate sātisāro bhavati /
tgt_original: 』若更有餘緣隨時稱說，若不爾者，作法不成，得別住罪。

src_original: Poṣ-v 68.1. āyuṣmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati /
tgt_original: 」具壽鄔波離請世尊曰：
